title: Hextech repair tool fails to remove the latest patch - Windows 10 conspiracy
body:
Hi

As always i can't dl the latest patch (pvp.net server kernel issue blabla has stopped working).

I tried many things, when it happened the 1st time i simply had to run lol as admin - problem fixed
The second time i simply had to delete some rad files and sht - problem fixed
The third time i used the hextech repair tool - problem fixed
The fourth time i had to delete and reinstall lol (took so long) - problem fixed
And now it happens again...
When i use the hextech repair tool it sais "Removing latest repatch ...failed. Error : The syntax of the command is incorrect ._. 
What the hell does it mean? (I'm not a native speaker, you may have noticed : my english is weird)

I'm pretty sure it's a conspiracy against my good'ol  windows version (windows 7, yeah ik but i like it, i don't want to get windows 10, i'm tilting when i use it on another computer)

If you have any clue to help me, if you think it's because i'm using windows 7 or if u'r simply tired to see me complaining in this section cause u got a brand new pc and ultimatly u don't give a fck about antique issues leave a comment~~ or send me a mystery gift ~~

replies.body: Dayum it's working now, anytime i come here and cry the problem fixes itself automatically :V magically delicious
How did you fix the problem?
Good to hear your issue is resolved.
